CustomField.formula: IF(OR(AND ( ISPICKVAL(Q_ShelfType__c , 'FX-4'), Q_Market__c <> 'Market North America'),AND(Q_Market__c = 'Market North America',OR( ISPICKVAL(Q_Kit__c , 'Simplex FX-4 kit with 16-PON card'),ISPICKVAL(Q_Kit__c , 'Redundant FX-4 kit with 16-PON card')))),True,False)
CustomField.label: C_FX4_Selected
